name: Funi of the Moon
description:
One morning, the cosmic chickens, who kept peace in the galaxy, were peacefully sleeping in a farm. A sudden black hole appeared and sucked them in, they appeared out all tied up and thrown all over the galaxy on different planets! Our hero, Funi Popycat, from the moon, must go and rescue all the chickens and find out who is behind all of this. Could it be Lord Clock who's behind this? The most evil galaxy villain and his minions? Find out soon..

MUSIC USED (PLACEHOLDER): Alfred Chicken Music by David Whittaker, Mark Knight

COMPLETION: 50%
